name: Hasty Lumin
description:
Help Lumin to navigate through the dark forest, in this atmospheric precision Platformer you will find a challenging experience that requires quick-thinking and fast reactions.

  • A single-player adventure with your friend Lumin, together you can do this.
  • A big scary jungle with a lot of obstacles to overcome.
  • The controls are simple and accessible.
  • Lumin keeps his speed at all times, you can time his jumps and switch Lumin's color.
  • Lumin can only interact with the same colored platforms.

So, can Lumin count on you?

*This is a demo version*
